about_text: a passionate Software Engineer specialized in building modern, secure, and user-centric web applications.
about_text2: I blend frontend development with cybersecurity awareness and data analysis to deliver efficient, scalable digital solutions.
about_text3: Whether it’s crafting clean interfaces with React and Tailwind CSS, or integrating backend logic with Node.js — I’m all about bringing ideas to life securely and beautifully.
hero_professions: Software Engineer | Web Developer | Cybersecurity & Data Analyst

fullstackJS.title: Fullstack Web Application Development Bootcamp using JavaScript
fullstackJS.description: A comprehensive bootcamp focusing on building web applications using JavaScript on both client and server sides, including interactive UI development, database management, and utilizing modern fullstack technologies to build practical ready-to-use projects.

networkPlus.title: Network+
networkPlus.description: Students are trained on the Network+ course by CompTIA, which introduces fundamental networking concepts and prepares learners for future technologies like Microsoft or Cisco.

networkPenTest.title: Network Penetration Testing
networkPenTest.description: This bootcamp aims to teach network penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, finding security flaws in applications, and sniffing devices connected to the same local network using various tools and techniques.

webAppPenTest.title: Web Application Penetration Testing Bootcamp
webAppPenTest.description: This bootcamp teaches web application penetration testing and vulnerability assessment, qualifying participants to earn the professional certifications eWPTv2 and eWPTX by eLearnsecurity.

digitalForensics.title: Digital Forensics Analysis
digitalForensics.description: A course specialized in digital forensic analysis helping you understand digital evidence collection and analysis, preparing trainees for the professional eCDFP certification by eLearnsecurity.

grcIntro.title: Introduction to Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC)
grcIntro.description: Aims to enable trainees to understand the fundamentals and importance of governance, risk management, and compliance in organizations, providing knowledge and tools for risk assessment and regulatory adherence.

cyberFundamentals.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals Bootcamp
cyberFundamentals.description: This bootcamp covers cybersecurity basics and penetration testing with a focus on protecting systems and vulnerability assessment. Participants become qualified for the CompTIA eJPT certification from INE.
